queries: This sign can also be made by bending a Flat handshape.
interjection: 1. Used alone to tell someone to come over to where you are. English = 'Come here!'
verbLexeme: 1. To ask someone to come over from where they are to where you are; to ask someone to come closer to you. English = beckon.
nominalLexeme: 1. The act of calling or signalling someone to come closer to you. English = beckoning.
oldEntry: Popular explanation: the culturally shared gesture of beckoning.
